title: Lulu - Sated Devourer Stacking!
body: So I was just messing around in normals with Lulu jungle, obviously not the natural champion to be played in the jungle, but fun nonetheless. However I noticed once I had managed to get to the 30 stacks required for transformation the devourer didn't transform like it was supposed to, ie. I had the cute little wolf with me the rest of the game (no real problems there). But I was just wondering if there was a known bug with Lulu and the sated devourer, note, I had built it using trailblazer and using the devourer enchantment so it could be through this as well. Just thought I'd put it out there.
